home.introduction: I'm Vivian, a web developer and i want to share my experiences. I am currently working on web design & UI/UX !

about.header: My name is Vivian, I am a web developer who is enthusiastic about creating, shaping and experimenting !
about.about1: Surrounded by creative people from different fields (2D cinematic animation, music, photography...), I discovered the pleasure of letting your artistic fiber express itself. Thus, I wanted to discover the world of web design.
about.about2: This site acts as a portfolio of my experiences, front-end skills, but is above all a challenge that I set myself. The very first site that I imagined and developed.

contact.header: Thank you very much for giving me feedback on my work! I can't wait to hear what you thought of it, and how I could improve it
contact.email: You can mainly contact me by email :

legal.header: This section aims to inform you about the legal and regulatory aspects regarding the use of this website.
legal.host: As part of legal compliance, please note that Hostinger is the host of this website, in accordance with article 6, III-1 of the French Law for Confidence in the Digital Economy (LCEN).
legal.links: I am not responsible for the legal choices and the content of external sites accessible via hypertext links on this website.
legal.cookies: No personal data is collected or processed on this website, in accordance with respect for privacy and the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Additionally, no cookies are used on this site.

creativity.title: Creativity*
creativity.desc: As a front-end web developer, I felt the need to express my creativity and not just create tables or forms as we are often used to. Giving myself the freedom to imagine innovative designs that capture users' attention and improve their online experience is much more interesting to me. This need for artistic research and creativity pushes me to stay on the lookout for the latest trends and technologies, which enriches my expertise and allows me to create websites that are both aesthetic and functional.
creativity.finally: Ultimately, it's the satisfaction of seeing my ideas come to life on the screen that motivates me to constantly cultivate my creativity in my web development work.
